attributes.action: Make the radio 1 DJ Scott Mills an MP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government have made it clear, that none of the people who walk into that building have a clue how most of the country lives. Let alone the 15-30 age group.

Scott Mills is a popular intelligent individual who is constantly in touch (properly in touch, not just "have a meeting" in touch) with young people, in real terms.

I believe Scott Mills would add great value to the houses of parliament in giving useful input in regarding young peoples genuine opinions and contributions.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
